text: Yevgeni Stanislavovich Markov (Russian: Евгений Станиславович Марков; born 7 July 1994) is a Russian professional association football player. He currently plays for FC Tosno. == Career == He played his first match with Zenit-2 Saint Petersburg on 15 July 2013 in a game against FC Tosno. He played his first match in the Russian Football National League on 7 September 2014 for Yenisey Krasnoyarsk against Volga Nizhny Novgorod. == References == == Other websites == * Profile by Russian Football National League * Yevgeni Markov at Soccerway Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Saint Petersburg
title: Yevgeni Markov (footballer, born 1994)
